general.gigTitle: develop a responsive wordpress website with elementor pro, wordpress elementor

sellerCard.description:
Hello! I'm Kathy, a professional web designer and developer specializing in WordPress.

Since 2020, I've been passionate about creating beautiful, functional websites catering to your needs. Whether you’re looking for a simple landing page or a fully e-commerce-enabled site, I’ve successfully built over 150 websites for clients across various industries.

Ready to elevate your online presence? Let’s collaborate to create a stunning website that showcases your business or personal brand. Feel free to reach out to discuss your project, ask questions, or say hello. I can’t wait to help you!

description.content:
READ ME: All website design projects come with full support and google console connection


Are you looking for a responsive site built with elementor pro that captures your brand essence? Look no further for you have located the right WordPress gig.


My service is focused at converting your website visitors to willing customers.


As a seasoned and well experienced WordPress developer, I offer premium, unique and customizable WordPress website geared towards increasing your online presence.


With Elementor pro page builder, I have built over 40 site for notable brand that has helped them generate mindblowing revenues.



What I Offer:

  • Unique layouts that reflect your brand identity
  • Copywritten content
  • WordPress Blog
  • Google console connections
  • Responsive & Mobile-Friendly
  • SEO-Friendly
  • Fast-loading sites with robust security measures.
  • E-Commerce Solutions
  • and lots more!



Why choose my gig?

  • 100% Client satisfaction
  • Quality project delivered
  • On time delivery
  • Revisions and free business consultations after completion of the project


Ready to get started?


Click the "Order Now" or "Contact" button, and lets build the website of your dreams together!

slide.name: develop a responsive wordpress website with elementor pro, wordpress elementor
develop a responsive wordpress website with elementor pro, wordpress elementor

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: For wordpress website built with elementor pro, you need a domain address and hosting to link the website and also wordpress login to have access to the bank end and to be able to customize your website, a logo if you have one, image contents and texts you'll like to add to your website

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be responsive on mobile devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, your WordPress website will be 100% responsive on all devices.

questionsAndAnswers.question: May I place a direct order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No. Please contact me before placing an order as that it'll help in discussing vital information that will help in creating a unique and amazing wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you redesign an existing WordPress Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can redesign WordPress website depending on your preference and some functionalities and features that I see is best for your WordPress website

reviews.comment: Smith did a really fantastic job with my site. Not only was she able to ensure that my buyers drop reviews for any meal they buy, she was also able to make my business easier by ensuring buyers can place an order and know the time they'll get their meal in their door step. She really went above expectations. Will work with her on future projects.

seller_response.comment: Thanks Jerry and thanks for the tip.

reviews.comment: Smithlancer truly delivered an OUTSTANDING website development experience! Their attention to detail and professionalism exceeded all expectations, and working with them was a breeze thanks to their politeness, cooperation, and quick responsiveness. Highly recommend! 👍

Just as usual, Kathy never disappoints. Always delivering quality services and always ensuring I follow up with the whole process of the project. She was also prompt to answer my questions!

Will highly recommend.
Thank you Smithlancer, you did a really great job with the form page. I'm really impressed wth the branding too, such a nice work, highly recommended.

Smithlancer is a genius! The landing page design is awesome. She paid rapt attention to details and was diligent and awesome with the project. 

I am definitely working with her on future projects.
